content: Section "Users" includes the users you selected in the previous step. By default, it is always enabled and can't be unselected.

comment.text: The "UsersSectionDescription" translation key provides a textual explanation for the "Users" section in the import step process. It helps to inform users that this section always includes selected users and cannot be disabled by default. This text typically appears on-screen as a tooltip or within an import component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The quotation marks around "Users" are not consistently used. English uses double quotes, while Arabic appears to be using Arabic quotes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent use of double quotes ("") for the "Users" section name to match the English source and maintain consistency within the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The quotation marks used for "Потребители" are incorrect for Bulgarian. They should be guillemets (« »).

The phrase "can't be unselected" is translated as "impossible à désactiver". While technically correct, it's a bit clunky and less natural in French. A more fluid translation would be "ne peut pas être désactivée" or "n'est pas désactivable".
The word "Օգտատերեր" should be "Օգտվողներ". It is a common misspelling but "Օգտվողներ" is the correct term for 'users'.
The verb agreement is incorrect. 'abilitato' should agree with 'sezione' which is feminine. It should be 'abilitata'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La sezione "Utenti" include gli utenti selezionati nel passaggio precedente. Per impostazione predefinita, è sempre abilitata e non può essere deselezionata.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation uses a slightly verbose phrasing that could be more concise while maintaining clarity. While not strictly incorrect, it feels less natural than it could be.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise phrasing such as: "Sadaļā 'Lietotāji' ir iekļauti lietotāji, kurus iepriekš izvēlējāties. Tas ir vienmēr aktivizēts un to nevar atslēgt."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "Deze" is ambiguous. It's unclear what it refers to (the section or the default state). It should be more specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change "Deze is standaard altijd ingeschakeld" to "Het gedeelte is standaard altijd ingeschakeld" or "Dit is standaard altijd ingeschakeld" depending on the intended reference.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "ativado" (enabled) isn't the most natural translation for "enabled" in this context. "Habilitado" or "ativo" would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A seção "Usuários" inclui os usuários selecionados na etapa anterior. Por padrão, está sempre habilitado/ativo e não pode ser desmarcado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ativado' (activated) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'enabled' in this context. While technically correct, 'habilitado' would be a more accurate and natural-sounding translation for 'enabled' when referring to a section or feature.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A seção "Usuários" inclui os usuários selecionados na etapa anterior. Por padrão, está sempre habilitada e não pode ser desmarcada.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'odзначити' (odznaciti) should be 'онемогућити' (onemogućiti) for better clarity and accuracy in this context.

The Chinese translation includes double quotes around the word "用户" (User). While quotation marks can be used in Chinese, in this context they are unnecessary and slightly awkward. They make it appear as if 'User' is a variable or a term being specifically defined.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the double quotes around “用户”. The translation should be: “用户部分包括您在上一步中选择的用户。默认情况下，它始终处于启用状态，无法取消选择。”
